Symbol.Script_3D:
if bst_use<EPS then end if show_perem_3d<EPS then end if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE=9 then end !------------------------------------------------------------- !---------- Отображение ж/б усиления в 3д -------------------- !------------------------------------------------------------- SHADOW OFF, OFF RESOL 5 del top addz -otstup_2 mulx -1 !if bRotated=1 and SYMB_MIRRORED=0 then mulx -1 mulz sgn(otstup) if not((AC_Wall_Direction_Type=0) or (AC_Wall_Direction_Type=2)) then if abs(otstup)-900<EPS then addz -abs(otstup) mulz -1 addz -max_t/2 else if abs(otstup)-900<EPS then addz abs(otstup) mulz -1 addz -max_t/2 endif show_hole = (abs(GLOB_STRUCTURE_DISPLAY-upr_n)<EPS or (GLOB_VIEW_TYPE = 9)) add -ac_wallhole_width/2,-WIDO_SILL_HEIGHT,0
if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT or bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFTNOUP then start_x = -bst_th : start_y = 0 : start_z = 0 : gosub "hbst_l_down" start_x = -bst_th : start_y = 0 : start_z = max_t : gosub "hbst_l_down" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT or bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHTNOUP then start_x = ac_wallhole_width+bst_th : start_y = 0 : start_z = 0 : gosub "hbst_l_down" start_x = ac_wallhole_width+bst_th : start_y = 0 : start_z = max_t : gosub "hbst_l_down" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFTNOUP then start_x = -bst_th : start_y = h_0 : start_z = 0 : gosub "hbst_l_up" start_x = -bst_th : start_y = h_0 : start_z = max_t : gosub "hbst_l_up" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHTNOUP then start_x = ac_wallhole_width+bst_th : start_y = h_0 : start_z = 0 : gosub "hbst_l_up" start_x = ac_wallhole_width+bst_th : start_y = h_0 : start_z = max_t : gosub "hbst_l_up" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_UP or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT then start_x = ac_wallhole_width : start_y = h_0+bst_th : start_z = 0 : gosub "hbst_l_left" start_x = ac_wallhole_width : start_y = h_0+bst_th : start_z = max_t : gosub "hbst_l_left" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_UP or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT then start_x = 0 : start_y = h_0+bst_th : start_z = 0 : gosub "hbst_l_right" start_x = 0 : start_y = h_0+bst_th : start_z = max_t : gosub "hbst_l_right" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH then put 0,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,h_0+bst_th,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,h_0+bst_th,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width,h_0,15 put 0,h_0,15 gosub "model" endif if bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT then put 0,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,h_0+bst_th,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_l_left,h_0+bst_th,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_l_left,h_0,15 put 0,h_0,15 gosub "model" endif if bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT then put ac_wallhole_width,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,h_0+bst_th,15 put -bst_l_right,h_0+bst_th,15 put -bst_l_right,h_0,15 put ac_wallhole_width,h_0,15 gosub "model" endif if bst_raspol = irasp_LEFTNOUP then put 0,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,h_0+bst_l_up,15 put 0,h_0+bst_l_up,15 gosub "model" endif if bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHTNOUP then put ac_wallhole_width,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,h_0+bst_l_up,15 put ac_wallhole_width,h_0+bst_l_up,15 gosub "model" endif if bst_raspol = irasp_UP then put -bst_l_right,h_0+bst_th,15 put -bst_l_right,h_0,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_l_left,h_0,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_l_left,h_0+bst_th,15 gosub "model" endif if bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP then put 0,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put -bst_th,h_0+bst_l_up,15 put 0,h_0+bst_l_up,15 gosub "model" put ac_wallhole_width,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,-bst_l_down,15 put ac_wallhole_width+bst_th,h_0+bst_l_up,15 put ac_wallhole_width,h_0+bst_l_up,15 gosub "model" endif del top end "model": pen pen_cont building_material bst_material material _mat sect_attrs{2} pen_cut, 1 if show_hole then PRISM_ NSP/3,max_t,use(nsp) WALLHOLE NSP/3,1,get(nsp) else PRISM_ NSP/3,max_t,get(nsp) endif return
"hbst_l_down": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_down, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y+1, start_z, unID, bst_l_down, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y-bst_l_down, start_z, unID, bst_l_down, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hbst_l_up": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_up, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y-1, start_z, unID, bst_l_up, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x, start_y+bst_l_up, start_z, unID, bst_l_up, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hbst_l_left": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_left, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x-1, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_left, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x+bst_l_left, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_left, 2: unID=unID+1 return
"hbst_l_right": HOTSPOT start_x, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_right, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x+1, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_right, 3: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT start_x-bst_l_right, start_y, start_z, unID, bst_l_right, 2: unID=unID+1 return
Symbol.Script_2D:
if bst_use<EPS then end if show_perem_2d<EPS then end if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE=9 then end
del top add2 0,otstup_2 mul2 1,SGN(otstup) if (AC_Wall_Direction_Type=0) or (AC_Wall_Direction_Type=2) then mul2 1,-1 if abs(otstup)-900<EPS then add2 0,abs(otstup) LINE_TYPE 1 LINE_PROPERTY 2 DRAWINDEX 20 if max_t>0 and bst_th>0 then if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT or bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP then put A/2,-max_t/2,0 put A/2+bst_th,-max_t/2,0 put A/2+bst_th,max_t/2,0 put A/2,max_t/2,0 WALLHOLE2 nsp/3,2,19,19,0,0,0,use(nsp) pen pen_cut fill _fillType POLY2_b nsp/3, 7, _fillPen, _fillBgPen, get(nsp) pen pen_cont wallline2 A/2+bst_th,-max_t/2,A/2,-max_t/2 wallline2 A/2+bst_th,max_t/2,A/2,max_t/2 wallline2 A/2+bst_th,-max_t/2,A/2+bst_th,max_t/2 wallline2 A/2,-max_t/2,A/2,max_t/2 line2 A/2+bst_th,-max_t/2,A/2,-max_t/2 line2 A/2+bst_th,max_t/2,A/2,max_t/2 line2 A/2+bst_th,-max_t/2,A/2+bst_th,max_t/2 line2 A/2,-max_t/2,A/2,max_t/2 hotspot2 A/2+bst_th,-max_t/2 hotspot2 A/2+bst_th,max_t/2 endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT or bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP then put -A/2,-max_t/2,0 put -A/2-bst_th,-max_t/2,0 put -A/2-bst_th,max_t/2,0 put -A/2,max_t/2,0
WALLHOLE2 nsp/3,2,19,19,0,0,0,use(nsp) pen pen_cut fill _fillType POLY2_b nsp/3, 7, _fillPen, _fillBgPen, get(nsp) pen pen_cont wallline2 -A/2-bst_th,-max_t/2,-A/2,-max_t/2 wallline2 -A/2-bst_th,max_t/2,-A/2,max_t/2 wallline2 -A/2-bst_th,-max_t/2,-A/2-bst_th,max_t/2 wallline2 -A/2,-max_t/2,-A/2,max_t/2 line2 -A/2-bst_th,-max_t/2,-A/2,-max_t/2 line2 -A/2-bst_th,max_t/2,-A/2,max_t/2 line2 -A/2-bst_th,-max_t/2,-A/2-bst_th,max_t/2 line2 -A/2,-max_t/2,-A/2,max_t/2 hotspot2 -A/2-bst_th,-max_t/2 hotspot2 -A/2-bst_th,max_t/2 endif endif del 1
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001 tpol = 0.1 unID=600
irasp_BOTH = 1 irasp_LEFT = 2 irasp_RIGHT = 3 irasp_UP = 4 irasp_NOUP = 5 irasp_LEFTNOUP = 6 irasp_RIGHTNOUP = 7 main_name = "" n = REQUEST ("Name_of_main", "", main_name)
h_0 = ac_wallhole_height+WIDO_SILL_HEIGHT h_serd = h_0 + bst_l_down + bst_l_up + bst_th * (bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT) if bst_raspol = irasp_UP then h_serd = 0
l_serd = bst_l_left + bst_l_right + ac_wallhole_width + 2 * bst_th * (bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP) + bst_th * (bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT) + bst_th * (bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT)+1.3 if (bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFTNOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHTNOUP) then l_serd = 0
l_hom = bst_th*2 + max_t*2 + 200/1000 n_hom = round_int((h_serd+l_serd)/0.2)
n_vkl = 0 if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH then n_vkl = 2 if (bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT) then n_vkl = 1
l_arm = (h_serd+l_serd+bst_l_vkl*n_vkl+0.65)*4 v_bet = (h_serd+l_serd)*bst_th*max_t*1.05
perem_class = "A500C" perem_class_dop = "A-I(A240)" perem_diam_dop = 8/1000 perem_diam = 10/1000 bst_l_vkl = 150/1000 marka_sten = "Обрамление проёмов tст=" + str("%.0mm",max_t) + "мм"
if GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE = 2 or GLOB_SCRIPT_TYPE = 3 then !------------ Параметры отображения ------------------------------------------------------------- dim perem_pen_sim_m[] : perem_pen_sim_m[1]=1 _fillType=1 : _fillPen=1 : _fillBgPen=0 : pen_cont = 1 : pen_sim = 1 : _mat = 0 show_perem_2d = 3 : show_perem_3d = 3 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_pen_cut", perem_pen_cut) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_pen_cont", perem_pen_cont) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_pen_eq_sim", perem_pen_eq_sim) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_pen_sim", perem_pen_sim) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_pen_sim_m", perem_pen_sim_m) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_fill_eq", perem_fill_eq) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_fill", perem_fill) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_fill_pen", perem_fill_pen) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "perem_fill_bg", perem_fill_bg) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "show_perem_2d", show_perem_2d) success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-perem", "show_perem_3d", show_perem_3d)
pen_cont = perem_pen_cont pen_cut = perem_pen_cut pen_sim = perem_pen_sim _fillType = perem_fill _fillPen = perem_fill_pen _fillBgPen = perem_fill_bg if inx = 0 then inx = 1 if not(perem_pen_eq_sim) then pen_sim = perem_pen_sim_m[9] endif if abs(show_perem_2d-3)>EPS then pen_cont = pen_sim pen_cut = pen_sim endif
bSucceed = request{2} ("Building_Material_info", bst_material, "gs_bmat_surface", _mat) if perem_fill_eq then n = REQUEST{2} ("Building_Material_info", bst_material, "gs_bmat_cutfill_properties", _fillType, _fillPen, _fillBgPen) endif if pen_cont<1 or pen_cont>255 then pen_cont=1 if pen_cut<1 or pen_cut>255 then pen_cut=1 if pen_sim<1 or pen_sim>255 then pen_sim=1 if _fillPen<1 or _fillPen>255 then _fillPen=1 if _fillBgPen<1 or _fillBgPen>255 then _fillBgPen=0 !------------ Параметры отображения ------------------------------------------------------------- endif
Symbol.Script_PR: if bst_use<EPS then end call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="45", subpos = marka_sten, pos = marka_sten, obozn=" ", naen=marka_sten, kol_vo_spec=1, komment=" ", n_elev = n_elev, mun_elev = 1 call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "3", marka=perem_class_dop, diam_arm=perem_diam_dop, dlin_st=l_hom, kol_vo_spec=n_hom, fon=0, plit=0, gnut=1, n_elev = n_elev, mun_elev = 1 call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="10", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "4", marka=perem_class, diam_arm=perem_diam, dlin_st=1, kol_vo_spec=l_arm, fon=1, plit=0, gnut=0, n_elev = n_elev, mun_elev = 1 call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="30", subpos = marka_sten, pos = "", obozn="ГОСТ 26633-2012", naen="Бетон В25", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=v_bet, komment="куб.м.", n_elev = n_elev, mun_elev = 1 if n_vkl>0 then call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos =marka_sten, pos = "", obozn="HILTI", naen="Вклейка арматуры hвкл=" + str("%.0mm",bst_l_vkl) + "мм.", ves=0, kol_vo_spec=n_vkl, komment="", n_elev = n_elev, mun_elev = 1 endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
if main_name = "" then UI_dialog `Пар-ры обрамления`,100,400 pId = 1 else pId = 902 UI_PAGE pId, -1, "Обрамление" endif
un_f = 40 : un = 1 ui_listfield un_f, 0, 0, 432, 200 ui_listitem un, un_f, "", 0, "", "Параметры ж/б обрамления" : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "bst_use", 1 : un = un + 1 if bst_use then ui_listitem un, un_f, "bst_th", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "bst_raspol", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "perem_diam", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "perem_class", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "perem_diam_dop", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "perem_class_dop", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "bst_l_vkl", 1 : un = un + 1 ui_listitem un, un_f, "bst_material", 1 : un = un + 1 endif
Symbol.Script_VL:
if bst_use<EPS then end dim traspol[7] : dim iraspol[7] : i=0 i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Оба" : iraspol[i] = irasp_BOTH i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Слева" : iraspol[i] = irasp_LEFT i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Справа" : iraspol[i] = irasp_RIGHT i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Только верх" : iraspol[i] = irasp_UP i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Без верха" : iraspol[i] = irasp_NOUP i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Слева без верха" : iraspol[i] = irasp_LEFTNOUP i=i+1 : traspol[i] = "Справа без верха" : iraspol[i] = irasp_RIGHTNOUP
values{2} "bst_raspol" iraspol, traspol
values "bst_th" range[0.13,1]
if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_NOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFTNOUP or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHTNOUP then PARAMETERS bst_l_left = 0 PARAMETERS bst_l_right = 0 LOCK "bst_l_left","bst_l_right" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_BOTH or bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT or bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT then PARAMETERS bst_l_up = 0 LOCK "bst_l_up" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_UP then PARAMETERS bst_l_up = 0 PARAMETERS bst_l_down = 0 LOCK "bst_l_up","bst_l_down" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_LEFT then PARAMETERS bst_l_right = 0 LOCK "bst_l_right" endif
if bst_raspol = irasp_RIGHT then PARAMETERS bst_l_left = 0 LOCK "bst_l_left" endif
parameters perem_class = perem_class parameters perem_class_dop = perem_class_dop parameters perem_diam_dop = perem_diam_dop parameters perem_diam = perem_diam parameters bst_l_vkl = bst_l_vkl
